author: andschwa
body:
Resolves #1682.

Whether or not remove the execution policy tests from the *nix build is an open question. However, with them removed currently, we have a test regression. This PR fixes that.

/cc @JamesWTruher @daxian-dbw

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: FYI if we'd released a new package without these changes, CI would have immediately started failing when the new package contained the bad modules. This should prevent that from happening again in the future.

title: Fix Execution Policy
